website_summaries.verdict: Keep wine bottles chilled perfectly – and secure – with this freestanding cellar that includes a locked door with two keys.
pros: Low noise and low vibration won't disturb wine's integrity
Modern appearance goes well in any room
Metal shelves slide out for easy access
Small enough to place on a countertop
Humidity control keeps corks from drying out
cons: As this is a single zone refrigerator, both reds and whites may not chill correctly together

customer_reviews.title: Only lasted for 45 days.
customer_reviews.text: Quit working after 45 days. Does not power on. DBROTH sent me a replacement even though it was past the 30 days. No questions asked. Great service. Problem is when I unboxed the replacement it was damaged. Look like it had been dropped even though the box was undamaged. It does work but it sits at awkward angle.
customer_reviews.author: R C

customer_reviews.title: Best gift ever
customer_reviews.text: Makes no noise, super small and convenient to move around the kitchen. Easy to use and set up. Not heavy. And I love the lock/key system it has with it. Makes it so much easier for my kids not being able to open it. My youngest tries everyday and you can hear the bottles shaking inside but it’s super sturdy and does not damage anything outside or inside
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo

customer_reviews.title: Must buy it for those who want control over the temp of their favorite wines.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my wife for mother's day. She absolutely loves it. As a strictly red wine drinker she loves the fact that she has full control over the tempature of her vino. The unit runs quiet and doesn't take up too much space. It's a must have iem for the wine connoisseur in your world.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: No Long term Use
customer_reviews.text: The digital numbers no longer wrk on fridge after 6 months & wine is not as cold as I'd like it, but its operational so.......
customer_reviews.author: Mocha

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase for price
customer_reviews.text: Keeps wine at perfect temp. No legs or base so would be best on some type of counter or table.
customer_reviews.author: Joey

customer_reviews.title: Completely silent
customer_reviews.text: It arrived perfectly packaged, I left it standing over night and when I plugged it in and set the temperature it was at 50° In about fifteen minutes. Completely silent and pretty good looking too. At this price you can't beat it. Very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard K

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. I like that the shelves can be removed so we can store open wine yet still have two shelves left to lay wine down.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Coleman

customer_reviews.title: It is not a noisy machine an it keeps the wine at a good temperature
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift they love the size an how the light is not blinding
customer_reviews.author: Qumadosha

customer_reviews.title: This is  a great wine cooler for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler is very sleek looking . The temperature is spot on.. Very quiet can never hear it run. Blue Led temperature read out can be read clear across the room. Door seals good. Just a great wine cooler..
customer_reviews.author: Jan M.

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SIZE!
customer_reviews.text: It was a birthday gift to my husband and he loves it! It's not too small or too big so it fits perfectly in the corner on the counter.
customer_reviews.author: TBug

customer_reviews.title: This not a unit in which to chill your white wines.
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler is perfect for keeping my good Burgundies at the correct temperature for aging. It is small, sleek, unobtrusive and super quiet. Only flaw is the glowing blue temperature gauge on the front. I have to keep it covered with black tape.
customer_reviews.author: susan e scioli

customer_reviews.title: The perfect gift to any wine lover!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for any wine lover! Looks great in the kitchen and keeps wine at the right temperature. The locking door feature is also nice especially if you have little kids.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this! Once I figured out how to set the temperature, it’s worked great and stays cool!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey P

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact I can lock it so no one can't touch my WINES.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: So far so good! Perfect to place wine in obviously and if ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! Perfect to place wine in obviously and if you do have bigger bottles it’s nice that the shelves are removable to fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: Great looking cooler but sometimes temperature increases by itself. Hopefully I can can live with that minor defect.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph R. Castillo

customer_reviews.title: Ivation 12 wine cooler/chiller w/door lock
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler maintains perfect wine temperatures for red and white wines. I love the lockable feature, however the digital temperature readout is no longer operating. I have no idea of wine temperatures within the cooler. I purchased this cooler February 1, 2019, took delivery February 5, 2019 and the digital temperature indicator stopped working September 5, 2019. It is my hope the seller DBROTH will replace or repair this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony M. Viviano Sr.

customer_reviews.title: Working Great
customer_reviews.text: This has worked perfect so far. I am loving it!!! I wish I could adjust temp setting just a tad lower. And I wish I would have paid more attention to height, I am going to have to buy a small table to set it on so I am not bending all the time to look for what I want!!
customer_reviews.author: smoothie

customer_reviews.title: Tighter than expected. It's alright I guess.
customer_reviews.text: I kind of like it, only problem is that it wasn't as roomy as I thought, I could only fit about 10 bottles in it and that was only achievable but pushing the bottles forcefully. I'm guessing you can only buy skinny short wine bottles for this because anything else won't even go in. It's alright I guess.
customer_reviews.author: GentlemanLite

customer_reviews.title: It’s quiet and attractive
customer_reviews.text: Thus far I am extremely impressed with the chiller, it exceeds my expectations. It is very quiet, attractive and easy to set up with a small footprint. I truly would be comfortable recommending this item to family and friends. Thank you for such an awesome product 🌸
customer_reviews.author: K. T. Vereen

customer_reviews.title: It's a very nice asset to your home
customer_reviews.text: This wine cooler is extremely quiet. I don't hear it at all. And it's always nice having a good bottle of wine chilling for whenever you want it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara L. Skidmore

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: My wife loved it. It took half a day for the temperature to get to the desired level. Great purchase so far, only had it for a few weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: Trey N

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had it for long, but it seems to be working just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Meg

customer_reviews.title: The perfect buy for those who enjoy chilled wine!
customer_reviews.text: We love our new wine cooler! It’s not too big and bulky that it takes up a lot of room but it is big enough to comfortably fit 12 bottles of wine (not champagne, as we discovered, however). It keeps them the perfect temperature and has a lock so that curious little hands don’t get into something they shouldn’t be.
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Is able to hold a lot of wine
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with how much wine this wine cooler is able to hold and preserve.
